trans-unit.source: The DI container supports constructor injection with the help of type hints for constructor parameters. trans-unit.source: The Formatter class is designed to format values according to a $locale. For this feature to work the PHP intl extension has to be installed. Most of the methods however work also if the PHP intl extension is not installed by providing a fallback implementation. Without intl month and day names are in English only. Note that even if the intl extension is installed, formatting date and time values for years >=2038 or <=1901 on 32bit systems will fall back to the PHP implementation because intl uses a 32bit UNIX timestamp internally. On a 64bit system the intl formatter is used in all cases if installed.
trans-unit.target: Formatter类旨在根据$ locale格式化值。为了使此功能正常工作，必须安装PHP intl扩展。但是，如果未通过提供后备实现来安装PHP intl扩展，则大多数方法也可以使用。不带intl的月份和日期名称仅使用英文。请注意，即使安装了intl扩展名，在32位系统上格式化年份== 2038或<= 1901的日期和时间值也将回到PHP实现中，因为intl内部使用了32位UNIX时间戳。在64位系统上，如果已安装，则在所有情况下都使用intl格式程序。

trans-unit.source: The HTML attributes for checkboxes. This can either be an array of attributes or an anonymous function (Closure) that returns such an array. The signature of the function should be the following: function ($model, $key, $index, $column). Where $model, $key, and $index refer to the model, key and index of the row currently being rendered and $column is a reference to the yii\grid\CheckboxColumn object. trans-unit.source: The Yii autoloader is capable of autoloading extension classes. The sole requirement is that an extension specifies the autoload section correctly in its composer.json file. Please refer to the Composer documentation for more details about specifying autoload.
trans-unit.target: Yii自动加载器能够自动加载扩展类。唯一的要求是扩展名在其 composer.json 文件中正确指定 autoload 部分。有关指定 autoload 更多详细信息，请参考Composer文档。

trans-unit.source: The Yii class autoloader supports the class map feature, which maps class names to the corresponding class file paths. When the autoloader is loading a class, it will first check if the class is found in the map. If so, the corresponding file path will be included directly without further checks. This makes class autoloading super fast. In fact, all core Yii classes are autoloaded this way.
trans-unit.target: Yii类自动加载器支持类映射功能，该功能将类名称映射到相应的类文件路径。自动加载器加载类时，它将首先检查是否在地图中找到该类。如果是这样，将直接包含相应的文件路径，而无需进一步检查。这使得类自动加载变得非常快。实际上，所有核心Yii类都以这种方式自动加载。

trans-unit.source: The above application configuration sets traceLevel to be 3 if YII_DEBUG is on and 0 if YII_DEBUG is off. This means, if YII_DEBUG is on, each log message will be appended with at most 3 levels of the call stack at which the log message is recorded; and if YII_DEBUG is off, no call stack information will be included.
trans-unit.target: 上述应用配置集TRACELEVEL为3，如果 YII_DEBUG 是上和0，如果 YII_DEBUG 关闭。这意味着，如果 YII_DEBUG ，则每个日志消息将被附加最多记录该日志消息的调用堆栈的3个级别；如果关闭了 YII_DEBUG ，则不会包含任何调用堆栈信息。

trans-unit.source: The above array describes the name and types of the columns to be created. For the column types, Yii provides a set of abstract data types, that allow you to define a database agnostic schema. These are converted to DBMS specific type definitions dependent on the database, the table is created in. Please refer to the API documentation of the createTable()-method for more information.
trans-unit.target: 上面的数组描述了要创建的列的名称和类型。对于列类型，Yii提供了一组抽象数据类型，可让您定义数据库不可知方案。这些将转换为依赖于数据库的DBMS特定类型定义，并在其中创建表。有关更多信息，请参考createTable（）方法的API文档。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that HTTP caching should be enabled for the index action only. It should generate a Last-Modified HTTP header based on the last update time of posts. When a browser visits the index page for the first time, the page will be generated on the server and sent to the browser; If the browser visits the same page again and there is no post being modified during the period, the server will not re-generate the page, and the browser will use the cached version on the client-side. As a result, server-side rendering and page content transmission are both skipped.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出，仅应为 index 操作启用HTTP缓存。它应该根据帖子的最新更新时间生成一个 Last-Modified HTTP标头。当浏览器第一次访问 index 页面时，该页面将在服务器上生成并发送到浏览器；如果浏览器再次访问同一页面，并且在此期间没有任何帖子被修改，则服务器将不会重新生成该页面，并且浏览器将在客户端使用缓存的版本。结果，服务器端渲染和页面内容传输都被跳过。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that HTTP caching should be enabled for the view action only. It should generate an ETag HTTP header based on the title and content of the requested post. When a browser visits the view page for the first time, the page will be generated on the server and sent to the browser; If the browser visits the same page again and there is no change to the title and content of the post, the server will not re-generate the page, and the browser will use the cached version on the client-side. As a result, server-side rendering and page content transmission are both skipped.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出应仅对 view 操作启用HTTP缓存。它应根据所请求帖子的标题和内容生成一个 ETag HTTP标头。当浏览器首次访问 view 页面时，该页面将在服务器上生成并发送到浏览器；如果浏览器再次访问同一页面，并且帖子的标题和内容没有更改，则服务器将不会重新生成页面，并且浏览器将在客户端使用缓存的版本。结果，服务器端渲染和页面内容传输都被跳过。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that page caching should be used only for the index action. The page content should be cached for at most 60 seconds and should be variated by the current application language and the cached page should be invalidated if the total number of posts is changed.
trans-unit.target: 上面的代码指出页面缓存仅应用于 index 操作。页面内容最多应缓存60秒，并且应根据当前应用程序语言而有所不同，并且如果更改了帖子总数，则缓存的页面应该无效。

trans-unit.source: The above code states that the extension depends on the jquery Bower package. In general, you can use bower-asset/PackageName to refer to a Bower package in composer.json, and use npm-asset/PackageName to refer to a NPM package. When Composer installs a Bower or NPM package, by default the package content will be installed under the @vendor/bower/PackageName and @vendor/npm/Packages directories, respectively. These two directories can also be referred to using the shorter aliases @bower/PackageName and @npm/PackageName.

trans-unit.source: The arguments for registerJsFile() are similar to those for registerCssFile(). In the following example, we register the main.js file with the dependency on the yii\web\JqueryAsset. It means that the main.js file will be added AFTER jquery.js. Without such dependency specification, the relative order between main.js and jquery.js would be undefined and the code would not work.
trans-unit.target: registerJsFile（）的参数类似于registerCssFile（）的参数。在以下示例中，我们注册了 main.js \ web \ JqueryAsset依赖项的main.js文件。这意味着将在 jquery.js 之后添加 main.js 文件。没有这样的依赖关系规范， main.js 和 jquery.js 之间的相对顺序将是不确定的，并且代码将无法正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The comparison is made by comparing the table names and the primary key values of the two active records. If one of the records is new they are also considered not equal.
trans-unit.target: 通过比较两个活动记录的表名和主键值进行比较。如果其中一条记录是新记录，则它们也被视为不相等。

trans-unit.source: The comparison of new and old values is made for identical values using ===.
trans-unit.target: 使用 === 对相同值进行新值和旧值的比较。

trans-unit.source: The comparison operator
trans-unit.target: 比较运算符

trans-unit.source: The comparison operator is intelligently determined based on the first few characters in the given value and internally translated to a MongoDB operator. In particular, it recognizes the following operators if they appear as the leading characters in the given value: <: the column must be less than the given value ($lt). >: the column must be greater than the given value ($gt). <=: the column must be less than or equal to the given value ($lte). >=: the column must be greater than or equal to the given value ($gte). <>: the column must not be the same as the given value ($ne). Note that when $partialMatch is true, this would mean the value must not be a substring of the column. =: the column must be equal to the given value ($eq). none of the above: use the $defaultOperator
trans-unit.target: 比较运算符是根据给定值中的前几个字符智能确定的，并在内部转换为MongoDB运算符。特别是，如果以下运算符在给定值中显示为前导字符，它会识别：<：列必须小于给定值（$ lt）。 >：该列必须大于给定值（$ gt）。 <=：该列必须小于或等于给定值（$ lte）。 > =：该列必须大于或等于给定值（$ gte）。 <>：该列不得与给定值（$ ne）相同。请注意，当$ partialMatch为true时，这意味着该值不能为该列的子字符串。 =：该列必须等于给定值（$ eq）。以上都不是：使用$ defaultOperator

trans-unit.source: The comparison operator is intelligently determined based on the first few characters in the given value. In particular, it recognizes the following operators if they appear as the leading characters in the given value:
trans-unit.target: 比较运算符是根据给定值中的前几个字符智能确定的。特别是,如果下列运算符在给定值中作为前导字符出现,它就会识别它们。

trans-unit.source: The comparison uses yii\base\Controller::$uniqueId, so each controller ID is prefixed with the module ID (if any). For a product controller in the application, you would specify this property like ['product'] and if that controller is located in a shop module, this would be ['shop/product'].
trans-unit.target: 比较使用yii \ base \ Controller :: $ uniqueId，因此每个控制器ID都以模块ID（如果有）为前缀。对于应用程序中的 product 控制器，您可以指定此属性，例如 ['product'] ，如果该控制器位于 shop 模块中，则为 ['shop/product'] 。

trans-unit.source: The configuration for an application is probably one of the most complex arrays in Yii. This is because the application class has a lot of configurable properties and events. More importantly, its components property can receive an array of configurations for creating components that are registered through the application. The following is an abstract from the application configuration file for the Basic Project Template.
